timeline.bodyText: Can't we initialize this with the number of DSs defined in the static config? Then we can grow on-demand if new ones created dynamically.
timeline.author: blazember

replies.bodyText: yes, this was also an idea, have to see how (un)intrusive it is to get the config in the constructor and iterate through it.
replies.author: mmedenjak

replies.bodyText: wildcard configs and configs based on default are a gotcha but I think it's fine to work with best-effort approach here.
replies.author: mmedenjak

replies.bodyText: Addressed this comment, also on other places. The approach is pretty simple, I just take the number of configs, which means wildcard and default also count as one. PTAL
replies.author: mmedenjak
